description: A desired or proposed or planned or estimated economic flow, usually with only one agent associated, which could become a commitment and/or economic event.

provider.description: The economic agent who intends to initiate the flow.

receiver.description: The economic agent for whom the flow is intended.

resourceClassifiedAs.description: Classification URIs or tags for the resource.

resourceQuantity.description: The amount and unit of the economic resource.

effortQuantity.description: The amount and unit of effort.

availableQuantity.description: The amount currently available for the offered resource.

hasPointInTime.description: The planned date/time of the flow.

due.description: The date/time the intent is expected to be fulfilled.

inputOf.description: Reference to a vf.planning.process this intent is an input of.

outputOf.description: Reference to a vf.planning.process this intent is an output of.

plannedWithin.description: Reference to a vf.planning.plan this intent is part of.

stage.description: Reference to a vf.knowledge.processSpecification for the required resource stage.

state.description: The required state of the desired resource.

finished.description: The intent is complete or not. Default false.

note.description: Any useful textual information about the intent.

image.description: URI to an image relevant to the intent.

imageList.description: URIs to images relevant to the intent.
